TEXT: CARDINAL . The applicant was born in DATE and lives in the village of GPE , GPE region .

CARDINAL . On DATE ORG awarded the applicant against the ORG - owned coal - mine “ Pioner ” UAH CARDINAL in compensation for work - related damage to his health . On DATE the ORG of Appeal reduced the award to ORG CARDINAL .
CARDINAL . On DATE ORG instituted the enforcement proceedings .
CARDINAL . DATE the applicant was paid the judgment debt owed to him .
CARDINAL . The judgment of CARDINAL DATE was enforced in full on DATE .
CARDINAL . The relevant domestic law is summarised in the judgment of ORG v. GPE ( no . CARDINAL/CARDINAL , § CARDINAL , DATE ) .
